title: Concurrent Programming using multiprocessing
summary:
How to use python's built in multiprocessing module to speed up the
processing of large amounts of data.
description:
@ Kiwi PyCon 2013 - Saturday, 07 Sep 2013 - Track 2

**Audience level**

Intermediate

**Abstract**

Will take a brief tour of Python's built in multiprocessing module and
how it can be used to solve real life programming problems. Will present
a demo on how to speed up processing of large amounts of data using
multiprocessing.

**Slides**

https://speakerdeck.com/nzpug/medhat-gayed-concurrent-programming-using-multiprocessing
